law.catch_line: The fees specified in this subtitle for the registration of a classified vehicle or for any intercha...
law.text:
The fees specified in this subtitle for the registration of a classified vehicle or for any interchangeable registration shall be paid to the Administration:
Before issuance of the registration and any registration plates and registration cards; and
Except as otherwise expressly provided, during each registration year before the issuance or renewal of the registration.
